us.summary: S&P 500 growing: +0.50% change. Market reflects positive economic momentum. Fed maintains current policy stance as inflation trends toward target. Industrial output strong, consumer confidence elevated. Economic indicators suggest sustained growth trajectory.

eu.summary: EUR/USD stable: +0.18% change. Euro trading in narrow range against USD. ECB maintaining current policy framework. Manufacturing PMI stable across major economies. Inflation near target levels, balanced economic outlook. Currency stability supports trade and investment flows.

china.summary: CNY/USD stable: -0.24% change. Yuan trading in managed range against USD. Industrial output steady, property sector stabilization underway. PBOC maintaining balanced monetary policy. Export growth moderate, domestic demand gradually improving. Economic indicators suggest stable growth trajectory with manageable risks.
